heisig_chinese_memo: An astronaut lands back at the launch domain (pad), kisses the earth beneath him with his mouth, then heads off to a fiesta to celebrate a safe flight.
heisig_constituent: range, soil, dirt, ground, pope, fiesta, mouth, one, floor
heisig_story: From its original meaning of a defined area or zone, a range has also come to mean a grazing land where cowboys roam and do whatever it is they do with cows. When the herds have all been driven to market, there is a great homecoming fiesta like that pictured here. As soon as the cowboys come home, home on the range, the first thing they do is kiss the ground (the mouth on the floor), and then get on with the fiesta.
koohiiStory1: An astronaut lands back at the launch range, kisses the earth beneath him with his mouth, then heads off to a fiesta to celebrate a safe flight.
koohiiStory2: Instead of Heisig¬¥s "Fiesta" I use "Spear". Why? A spear is just a DROP extra on an Arrow. Âüü, range actually means range as in limits/boundary/border sort of range(In a box it was the old meaning for CountryÂúã (581). Ok way too much etymology here, but back to story. With your SPEAR standing in a HOLE on the FLOOR with SOIL to its left9as you dug some out), you can see the RANGE of the spear in attacking a possible enemy (re Diablo and other RPGs, spear¬¥s have range).

WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: Under the dirt in the ground is a drunkard with something in his mouth from a region in North America. He died from whatever it is that‚Äôs in his mouth. That‚Äôs how this drunkard ended up under the ground in the first place. His whole face region is disfigured from whatever he ate. I wonder what region of North America the strange object came from?
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: Try and imagine yourself unearthing this dead drunkard and trying to figure out what‚Äôs in his mouth. Smell the decay of flesh as you poke around in his mouth, trying to figure out what this thing is. Think of an object and what region of North America it comes from.
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: In an attempt to identify what region of North America the thing in the drunkard‚Äôs mouth came from, you touch it and try to remove it with your bare hands. Upon touching whatever it is, you find it to be all icky („ÅÑ„Åç) and gooey. Like, super icky. So icky that you barf in the region immediately adjacent to you.
WaniKani_Reading_Info: Imagine touching this super icky substance from the drunkard‚Äôs mouth. It‚Äôs really icky. Feel yourself throwing up as you feel the icky goo in the region between your fingers.

chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: An astronaut lands back at the launch domain (pad), kisses the earth beneath him with his mouth, then heads off to a fiesta to celebrate a safe flight.
humanum_full_description_en:
From " earth " to " or ". "Shuowen" thought it was " or " or body. " Or " is mostly borrowed as a function word, and " domain " is used to indicate a region or a field. Such as "Zhou Li. Land official. "Da Situ": "Using the map of the world and the land, we know the area of Kyushu, the number of wide wheels, and distinguish the famous things of the mountains, forests, rivers, and hills." "Han Feizi. "Solving the old": "Husbands and tigers have domains, and their movements are sometimes. Avoiding their domains and saving time will avoid the harm of their tigers."

" Domain " also means a cemetery. "Guang Ya. "Shi Qiu": "The domain, the burial place." Such as "The Book of Songs. Tang Feng. "Ge Sheng": "Ge Sheng Mongolian thorns, vines in the domain." Zheng Xuanjian: "Domain, the burial domain." "The Yan Family Instructions. "Final System": "If you are afraid to worship and do not know the domain, you should build a low wall around the left and right, and it will be a private note."
humanum_short_description_en: From " earth " to " or ". "Shuowen" thought it was " or " or body. " Or " is mostly borrowed as a function word, and " domain " is used to indicate a region or a field.

Source glyph
area
Name meaning
: The original meaning of a domain refers to a range, a certain area. The extension is the meaning of opening up the territory and expanding the territory. Domain adjectives indicate territory and are synonymous with "state". Group words such as region, region, territory, territory, etc.

Meaning Mnemonic
Under the dirt in the ground is a drunkard with something in his mouth from a region in North America. He died from whatever it is that‚Äôs in his mouth. That‚Äôs how this drunkard ended up under the ground in the first place. His whole face region is disfigured from whatever he ate. I wonder what region of North America the strange object came from?
Try and imagine yourself unearthing this dead drunkard and trying to figure out what‚Äôs in his mouth. Smell the decay of flesh as you poke around in his mouth, trying to figure out what this thing is. Think of an object and what region of North America it comes from.
Reading Mnemonic
In an attempt to identify what region of North America the thing in the drunkard‚Äôs mouth came from, you touch it and try to remove it with your bare hands. Upon touching whatever it is, you find it to be all icky („ÅÑ„Åç) and gooey. Like, super icky. So icky that you barf in the region immediately adjacent to you.
Imagine touching this super icky substance from the drunkard‚Äôs mouth. It‚Äôs really icky. Feel yourself throwing up as you feel the icky goo in the region between your fingers.
